title: These forty years- and after; being the story, 1887-1927, of Bloor Street United Church Toronto, ... foreword by Rev. C.W. Gordon, D.D. (Ralph Connor), introduction by Rev. Professor T.B. Kilpatrick, D.D., Afterword, by Rev. George C. Pidgeon, B.A., D.D. ...
author: Wallace, William George, 1858-1949.
